definition: to agree on/to settle on
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
variant of 說|说[shuo1]
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Here is the deal. You clean the kitchen and I clean the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 就这样说定了，你清扫厨房，我清理浴室。
我们就说定星期一下午。

sentences.english: They have agreed on the time and place.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经说定了时间和地点。

sentences.english: That should be fine, Shall we say about 2 o'clock?
sentences.chinese: 应该没有问题，我们说定2点左右？
那么就这样说定了，好吗？

definition: (idiom) it's a deal/that's settled then
deference is no substitute for obedience (idiom)/(said to accept sb's request, invitation etc)
pinyin: gong1 jing4 bu4 ru2 cong2 ming4

definition: to refuse would be impolite
thus/in this way/like this
to readily consent
to do as promised/to be as good as one's word/to honor one's word/to mean what one says
to keep one's promise/to mean what one says
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
the matter should not be delayed/there's no time to lose
to set off/to take to the road
to come to an agreement/to complete negotiations
to regard sb as an outsider
let's talk about the unpleasant things first/let's be frank
pinyin: chou3 hua4 shuo1 zai4 qian2 tou5

definition: to set out/to leave
You figure it out for yourself./Do as you please.
another day/some other time/to find another day (for appointment etc)/to take a rain check
